item.title: Post 1 - Hurricane Ian
item.description: We have both been through hurricanes, but nothing compared to riding out Hurricane Ian in September of 2022. We had just moved to Florida and finished remodeling our house. Nine months after living through a remodeling hell - the big storm came to make its mark on Florida and us. The good news: We had finished getting hurricane grade windows, doors and roof installed only a few months prior to this crazy event.
